attributes.action: Allow site workers to be allowed to wear shorts on building sites
attributes.additional_details: The temperatures on building sites whilst wearing multiple items of PPE is unsafe and its extremely uncomfortable, in some cases people collapsing
attributes.background: Allow a waver to be signed not to sue the main contractor in event of any damage, cut or burns to the legs as a result

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about site policies on clothing are a matter for individual site managers, not the Government or House of Commons. You can read the Health and Safety Executive's guidance on PPE for construction workers here: https://www.hse.gov.uk/construction/faq-ppe.htm
